attributes.action: Remove Zimbabwe from COVID red list.
attributes.additional_details: Zimbabwe has been unfairly placed on COVID red list but there is no evidence there is any COVID variant emanating from Zimbabwe. Even the South African variant is no present in Zimbabwe. Zimbabweans are being restricted from travelling to bury their loved ones because of the quarantine they have to face on their return to UK which is very unfair because there is no evidence anyone has brought COVID into UK from Zimbabwe.
attributes.background: To remove Zimbabwe from COVID red list.
